1.0.0.description: Provides syntax highlighting for SugarCube 2 format

readme:
# SugarCube 2 language

Provides syntax highlighting for the SugarCube 2 format for the Twine/Twee story telling engine.

![Sample image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/martoko/language-sugar-cube/master/sample.png)

## Related technologies
[Twine](http://twinery.org/)  
[Twee](https://github.com/tweecode/twee)  
[TweeGo](https://bitbucket.org/tmedwards/tweego)  
[SugarCube 2](http://www.motoslave.net/sugarcube/2/)
